author: Margot Patrick
title: Activist Investor Takes Major Stake in Barclays
text:
Barclays PLC came under further pressure to step up turnaround plans after activist investor Sherborne Investors said Monday it has taken a 5.2% stake in the bank.
Sherborne, founded by investor Edward Bramson, hasnâ€™t said if it plans to seek any changes at the British bank, whose share price has lagged behind rivals in part because of questions about its business strategy combining investment banking, credit cards, and retail and commercial banking.
